text: It was an excellent experience to study the beginning of the Arabic language at the Arabic Council for two months, and the lecturer was patient and helpful for us in learning the language and Arabic culture. Thank you for providing us with a perfect platform here!

The attended the conversation classes with the native teacher..it was a great session learning to speak in a foreign language. They provide arabic tuition services too. Those looking for arabic tuition may contact Ustaz Aziz
Mona is the best for Arabic and Religion on Saturday
Great exercise for Madrasah Entrance Test
Excellent place for kids Arabic learning ❤️
